item.title: Simple steps to create your own GitHub webpage
item.description: This guide will help you to create your own GitHub Page from scratch using R package blogdown. Note : This tutorial assumes that you some background knowlege of R. So the first step is to install blogdown package. # install install.packages("blogdown") #load the library library(blogdown) Before getting started check whether hugo is installed in your system or not. If not, install using below command. sudo apt-get install hugo After successful installation of package blogdown and hugo you are ready to build your webpage.
